sentences.en: Although sentenced to life, he will become eligible for parole after serving 10 years.
sentences.cn: 虽然被判终身监禁，但是他在服刑10年后可以申请假释。

sentences.en: Establishes victim safety as consideration in determining bail or release on parole.
sentences.cn: 建立受害者的安全考虑决定保释或假释.

sentences.en: I'll never accept parole because that entails me accepting guilt.
sentences.cn: 我决不会接受假释，因为这就等于我承认自己有罪。

sentences.en: If released, he will continue to be on parole for eight more years.
sentences.cn: 如果获释，他还有8年假释期。

sentences.en: Le d é bit de parole est rapide pour vous mais en fait normal.
sentences.cn: 对你们来说语速快了点,但事实上这是正常的法国人说话速度.

sentences.en: No parole shall be granted without due legal process.
sentences.cn: 非经法定程序不得假释.

sentences.en: People on parole must follow certain rules.
sentences.cn: 被假释的人必须遵守一定的规定.

sentences.en: Prisoners are entitled to apply for parole.
She will become eligible for parole in 19 months.
sentences.cn: 19 个月以后她将符合假释条件。

sentences.en: The criminal promised to reform himself, so he was released on parole.
sentences.cn: 罪犯表示愿意改过自新, 所以被假释出狱了.

sentences.en: The guy's up for parole, they want me to testify.
sentences.cn: 那家伙就要假释了他们要我去作证.

sentences.en: They had broken their parole and fled.
sentences.cn: 他们违背假释誓言,逃之夭夭.

sentences.en: Well, last week, when I was sure that the parole was coming through, I wrote her again.
sentences.cn: 噢, 上个礼拜, 当我得知就要同意我假释出狱时, 我又给她写了封信.

sentences.en: You are aware that being at the track is a violation of your parole?
sentences.cn: 你明白跟踪已经违反了你的假释 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 语言；誓言，诺言；释放宣言

trans.tran_cn: 假释，假释期，[军]（俘虏的）释放宣言，[军]口令，暗号
trans.tran_en: If a prisoner is given parole, he or she is released before the official end of their prison sentence and has to promise to behave well

trans.tran_cn: 有条件释放，假释；使假释出狱；宣誓后释放
trans.tran_en: to allow someone to leave prison on the condition that they promise to behave well

trans.tran_cn: 假释，使假释出狱，允许宣誓后释放
